title: When I use mono audio from Accessibity settings, does it combine stereo channels?
content: General inquiry but I have a small mono Bluetooth speaker that I use on the go and a large one for work. I notice significant dropout on certain stereo-active songs so I'm asking about the acoustic profile of the mono feature, that I might do with the EQ of my media player.
category: Connectivity, Network, Bluetooth, Google Pixel 4 XL
